A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a huge disappointment to the Star Wars saga as a whole. For the Force Awakens I literally came out crying because of exciment and because of the death of han solo. I came out wanting to know what happens next\, but this movie completely destroyed my hope for this trilogy. Rian Johnson completely destroyed all the characters. I came out of this movie angry and disappointed. Not because it didn't go the way I wanted it to\, I just wish it went a different way. JJ Abrams would've been a way better director for this movie. I don't even think that Rian Johnson even likes or knows anything about star wars. I have no interest in these new characters like I used to. Snoke and Phasma was a complete waste. Think of it like basketball\, JJ set up a perfect pass and Rian Johnson missed. 1/2 out of 5 because the special effects atleast looked nice.
